nodes.text: The Hutt Consulate was the diplomatic representation of the Hutt Grand Council to the New Republic. It was located in Valorum Tower. Golga Besadii Fir was the brief final Hutt ambassador to Coruscant. When the Hutts announced that they would be working with the Yuuzhan Vong, the Hutt Consulate was targeted for a series of attacks, ranging from the water and power to get cut off, to bomb threats.
